name: Fight of the Bumblebee
description:
CYBER-BEARS FROM SPACE

From a galaxy far away CYBER-BEARS with RUMBLING TUMMIES in search of sweet sticky golden goodness.

Protect the HIVE, the QUEEN, and YOUR LIFE from certain destruction - by Bombarding the Bionic Bear Boss with Backwards Bees.

HOW TO PLAY
  • Move with WASD or Arrow Keys.
  • Pick up honey and deliver it into the Beerrett .50cal.
  • Pick up Beelers to replenish lives and stay in the game.
  • The Bionic Bear gets angrier as you go - tread carefully!
WHAT IS WHAT Description
It's you, the star of the show!
You're a guard bee, and it's your time to shine!
BFB (Bionic Ferocious Bear).
Avoid the attacks of the bear at all costs, and banish it from your Hive.
Beerrett .50cal.
This is your last line of defense against the BFB.
It uses honey to propel Beelets into the BFB, so keep it stocked up!
You can see how many shots are left to fire by the number of canisters that are still full. 
Honey.
This is the sticky stuff that keeps your hive together.
Full of uses, but right now you need to bring it to the Beerrett to fend of the BFB!
Honey expires after a while, which is indicated by it fading away slightly.
Make sure you walk over it in time! 
Beelers.
These little guys give you the vigor to keep fighting. 
Like the Honey, they can only stick around for so long!
Give them a high five and get back in there!
Honey Store.
This is how much Honey you currently have. 
Increase this by walking over Honey.
Be careful! If you fall into an empty Hex, you'll drop your Honey!
Your current health.
You can only take so much of a beating; you're a tough little Bee but your not invincible!
Once you lose all three lives, you'll be unable to continue the fight.

This game is a submission for Ludum Dare 49. Entry link here.
